title: Unable to upload .appxupload pakage
body:
I am not able to upload my edge extension package.
Every time I am getting error -

comments.body:
I have the same problem, and I have filled in the http://aka.ms/extension-request form 2 months ago.
No feedback from Microsoft, no email. I don't know if my submission process is on going or blocked

You need to request access to the Store to publish your Extension. http://aka.ms/extension-request
Though note it can take a while (I applied in March and never got anything).
